discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: Shouldn't `(sub|eq)_(path|cycle|sorted)_in` rather be renamed to `(sub|eq)_in_(path|cycle|sorted)`? (Sorry, my bad.)

tags.description: Issue or PR about addition of features.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message:
Add `pairwise r xs` predicate

which asserts that the relation `r` holds for any i-th and j-th element of `xs`
such that i < j.
